line_2: THE mariner, when first he sails,

line_1: THEE, STANLEY, thee, our gladden'd spirit hails,
line_2: Who, Habitants of Albion's inland vales,

line_1: And many a gladsome cheer the prospect hails;
line_2: While eagerly expanding all their sails

line_1: And each loved scene of first endearment hails;
line_2: With wondring ecstasy she now inhales,

line_1: And each loved scene of first endearment hails;
line_2: While every trembling nerve soft tenderness assails.

line_1: A native sin each vigorous Frenchman hails,
line_2: Politely partial to his own Versailles.
